intro: Disterigma acuminatum, commonly known as the slender disterigma, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many milkweed species. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink.
